feed.title: Notes from the trenches - playbook
feed.subtitle: Sandip Gangakhedkar | Entrepreneur | Technical leader | Innovator

entry.title: Building a deep-tech startup on a shoestring budget
entry.summary: It is 2023, venture funding is the lowest in a decade, amidst the global economic slowdown. Against this backdrop, what does it take to build a deep-tech startup with severely limited resources?
